data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module converts strings into arrays of positive integers and
    vice-versa. Sequential integers in the input array are replaced by a
    range (e.g. '1-5') in the output string. Text::NumericList class is
    useful for applications where a user is required to enter large
    arrays of integers. For example, instead of making the user select
    50 check-boxes or list 50 numbers, the user can just type '1-50' in
    a text input field.

    The module functionality has to do with text conversion, hence the
    choice of the namespace.
